name: apex-ai-platform
description: APEX AI Security Platform - Unified Development Environment

scripts.start: echo "ğŸš€ Starting APEX AI Platform Development Environment..." && concurrently --prefix-colors "cyan.bold,yellow.bold,green.bold" --prefix "[{name}]" --names "CLIENT-PORTAL,BACKEND,FRONTEND" --kill-others-on-fail "npm run start-client-portal" "npm run start-backend" "npm run start-frontend"
scripts.start-client-portal: echo "ğŸŒ Starting Client Portal on http://localhost:5173" && cd client-portal && npm run dev
